skills.name: TORTURE
desc: • Deals 3 hits of true damage to a single target.
• 20% Chance to Stun with each hit.
• Damage dealt increases based on the MAX HP of you and your enemy.

skills.name: SHRIEK
desc: • 40% Chance to Taunt all enemies for 1 turn.

skills.name: BLOCK
desc: Takes the damage for any ally below 50% HP or any attack that would reduce an ally below 50% HP.
